Posts.Content: May 7, 2008 08:23AM hannah01 wrote: Helen,  In Dec of 07 I had rads for lower back and left hip because of constant and intense pain.  Couldn't believe the relief I received from 4 weeks of rad.  Of course, there was fatigue and also slight skin burning in that area.  I have BC mets in liver, spine, lower back and left hip.  My rad onc has me using a cane to keep pressure off left hip.  Praying for you and hugs to you. Teresa
Posts.Title: rads to the hip Helen1 badboob67
